document.full_text: like a lot of other joplin homeowners, herndon snider rode out the may 22 tornado in a bathtub. other popular places to take cover from the vicious tornado were closets and center hallways.
document.title: without basements, joplin had scant refuge from tornado
lines_and_colors: like a lot of other joplin homeowners, herndon snider rode out the may 22 tornado in a bathtub. other popular places to take cover from the vicious tornado were closets and center hallways.
